estion "What is the eighth term of the sequence $\frac{125}{9}, \frac{25}{3}, 5, 3, \ldots$?", we need to follow these steps:
Identify the pattern of the sequence.
Calculate the common ratio (r) of the geometric sequence.
Determine the first term ($a_1$) of the sequence.
Use the formula for the nth term of a geometric sequence ($a_n = a_1 \cdot r^{n-1}$) to find the eighth term.
